app.name: Nintendont - Riders
app.long_description:
Original creators: FIX94, creditar. Commiters: GerbilSoft, JoostinOnline, GreyRogue, Howard, Cyan Modifications by: nfsman34
Nintendont allows you to run GameCube games on a Wii or Wii U from an SD or HDD device. This build allows for oversized Gamecube ISOs to run.
